properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Sumer is icumen in Lhude sing cuccu Groweth sed and bloweth med and springth the wde nu Sing cuccu

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Awe bleteth after lomb lhouth after calue cu Bulluc sterteth bucke uerteth murie sing cuccu

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Cuccu cuccu Wel singes thu cuccu ne swik thu nauer nu

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Sing cuccu nu Sing cuccu Sing cuccu Sing cuccu nu Modern English

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Summer is a comin' in, Loudly sing, cuckoo! The seed is growing And the meadow is blooming, And the wood is coming into leaf now, Sing, cuckoo!

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: The ewe is bleating after her lamb, The cow is lowing after her calf; The bullock is prancing, The billy-goat farting,

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: Sing merrily, cuckoo! Cuckoo, cuckoo, You sing well, cuckoo, Never stop now.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: Sing, cuckoo, now; sing, cuckoo; Sing, cuckoo; sing, cuckoo, now!
